data.title: Persia and the Persian Question, volume I
data.meta_description: Bahá'í articles, books, translations, and historical materials
data.text:
Abstract:

In Moojan Momen's "The Bábí and Bahá'í Religions 1844-1944: Some Contemporary Western Accounts" (1981), p. 45, the work is described: "One of the most remarkable books ever to appear on Persia…", reviewed through p. 47 and used many times beyond.

Notes:

This book is also available as a nicely-formatted PDF (3.5MB; formatted by Bobbi Lyons). Both volumes are online in a variety of formats at archive.org.

This edition London: Frank Cass & Co. Ltd., 1966.
